column1: In December, the top five countries that generated the most international tourism to Sri Lanka
were  the  Russian  Federation,  India,  the  United  Kingdom,  Australia,  and  Germany.  The
Russian Federation was the leading source of tourists, accounting for 29% of total arrivals.
India accounted for 25%, the United Kingdom for 11%, Australia for 8%, and Germany for 7%.
